name: Stringmaster
description: Stonard opens, the rope triggers, the sky is condensed, the enemy will be oppressed by the invisible momentum and unable to move, the Scar caused by the thousands of rapid electricity will never be able to heal.
effect: Secret Electric Amplification: All Resonance damage is increased by a percentage. After casting Resonance Liberation or Outro Skill, attack is increased by a percentage, the effects are independent and can be stacked up to 12% layers and last for 2 seconds.
